tool_description:
IFC models related BIM services
GITHUB Repository : https://github.com/aminov-jp/BIMIFCServices
name: IFC BIM Services
title: IFC BIM Services

api_list.name: ilod_status_ilod__ticket__get
api_list.description: Check Result of an ILOD check

schema.title: ILODResults

result.title: Result

items.title: ILODResult
items.description:
A class that represents an ILOD result object.

Attributes:
-----------
id : str
    A string representing the GUID of the IFC element.
fail : List[str]
    A list of strings representing the list of failed rules.
success : List[str]
    A list of strings representing the list of successful rules.

result.description:
A class that represents a result object.

Attributes:
-----------
__root__ : Dict[str, List[ILODResult]]
    A dictionary representing the root object of the result.

schema.description:
A class that represents an ILOD results object.

Attributes:
-----------
result : Result
    A Result object representing the result of the ILOD operation.
expiry : str
    A string representing the expiration time of the result.

api_list.name: exists_exists__ticket__get
api_list.description: Check if the key ticket is available or not

api_list.name: syntax_status_syntax__ticket__get
api_list.description: Check Result of a syntax check
